book.synopsis: Forced to flee their native Caribbean island after an attempted coup, the Garcias--Carlos, Laura, and their four daughters--must learn a new way of life in the Bronx, while trying to cling to the old ways that they loved.
book.title_long: How the Garcia Girls Lost Their Accents
book.dimensions: Height: 8.25 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 0.75 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
